name: OrderUpdates
0:
”Alexa, open order updates”
”Alexa, ask order updates where are my deliveries”
”Alexa, ask order updates to give me an update from store name”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: order updates
Developer Terms of Use
des:
PLEASE NOTE: Order Updates works with select online retailers. First subscribe to notifications on their site to get started, then download this skill. Look out for the Order Updates sign up button on your favourite ecommerce stores. Order Updates brings advanced order tracking right into your home. 

Order Updates gives you a new way to keep track of your deliveries. Get delivery notifications or request an update on an order at any time. 

After making a purchase, you’ll get alert notifications at key stages of your package's delivery. Know exactly when it’s been shipped, when it’s due to be delivered and more, without ever having to lift a finger. 

Want an update now? No problem, after you’ve made a purchase and tracking information is available, just ask Alexa ‘Order Updates, where’s my deliveries?’. You’ll get an update on all your incoming deliveries; whether they’re due to be collected, whether there’s been a problem or delay, and so much more. 

Want to know the status of a delivery from a specific retailer? Just ask 'Order Updates, give me an update from (store name)'. 

With Order Updates' advanced delivery tracking features, you’ll never be at a loss over a package again.
